# splits

List of recent Stock splits for all tickers or for a given ticker.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/splits [ticker]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/splits AAPL
```

---
